dependent_to.description:
A generalist algorithm for cell and nucleus segmentation that can be
optimized for your own data

dependent_to.description:
CellProfiler cell image analysis software. CellProfiler is a free open-
source software designed to enable biologists without training in
computer vision or programming to quantitatively measure phenotypes from
thousands of images automatically.
dependent_to.name: py-cellprofiler

dependent_to.description:
DXchange provides an interface with tomoPy and raw tomographic data
collected at different synchrotron facilities.
dependent_to.name: py-dxchange

dependent_to.description:
The Deep Learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products
Lightning fast.

dependent_to.description: Roifile is a Python library to read, write, create, and plot ImageJ ROIs

dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.
